HOME.ONE_TIME_SECRET_MESSAGING_SUBTITLE: Raba sirrin, kuma sai su bace!
HOME.ENCRYPTED_PROTECTED_BY: An encrypt da tsaro daga Stellar Security
HOME.WITHOUT_TRACE_DESCRIPTION: Muna tabbatar da kariya mai karfi ga bayananka masu muhimmanci. Duk bayanai ana encrypt su a gefen abokin ciniki. Ba mu san adireshin IP dinka ba, abin da kake raba ba, ko wanda kake raba haɗin sirri tare da shi - kuma mafi muhimmanci, abun ciki.
HOME.PRIVACY_PROTECTED_DESCRIPTION: Kai ne kawai wanda ke san haɗin sirrin da ka ƙirƙira da wanda ka raba shi da shi. Lokacin ƙirƙirar sirri, za ka iya ƙara kalmar wucewa kafin a iya buɗe shi. Hakanan yana yiwuwa a saita lokacin ƙarewa. Duk da haka, sirrin zai bace bayan kwana 14.
HOME.END_TO_END_ENCRYPTED_DESCRIPTION: Dukkan haɗin da abun ciki suna hashed a gefen abokin ciniki, ma'ana har ma mu ba mu san haɗin da abun ciki ba. Kowanne haɗin yana da ID na musamman na tsawon 36 wanda shine encrypt ɗin hanya don samun damar zuwa Sakon Sirri da abun ciki wanda aka encrypt da AES-256.
HOME.STEP_1_TITLE: Rubuta sakonka da/ko ƙirƙirar kalmar wucewa
HOME.SHARE_ENCRYPTED_BY: An encrypt da tsaro daga Stellar Security
HOME.SHARE_TEXTAREA_PLACEHOLDER: Rubuta sakon sirrin ka, kalmar wucewa ko bayanan sirri *

CONFIRMATION.SECRET_UNAVAILABLE_TEXT: Ba zai kasance a samu ba

VIEW.INSTRUCTION: Rubuta da aika sako, zai bace bayan an karanta.
VIEW.SHOW_MESSAGE_ONCE: Sakon da ke ƙasa zai bayyana sau ɗaya kawai
VIEW.DOWNLOAD_MESSAGE: Sauke Stellar Secret akan wayarka, ƙirƙiri sakonnin sirrinka
